name: trace
description: A macOS app that captures digital activity, generates Markdown notes, builds a relationship graph, and provides time-aware chat/search

scripts.app: npm run build && npm run pack && open release/mac/Trace.app

author: Jun Kim

extendInfo.NSScreenCaptureUsageDescription: Trace needs screen recording permission to capture screenshots of your activity.
extendInfo.NSAccessibilityUsageDescription: Trace needs accessibility permission to detect which app and window you are using.
extendInfo.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Trace uses your location to add context to your activity notes.
extendInfo.NSLocationUsageDescription: Trace uses your location to add context to your activity notes.
extendInfo.NSAppleEventsUsageDescription: Trace needs automation permission to get information about running applications.
